core

Class Panel

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Panel

  • public class Panel
extends java.lang.Object
    The status panel. Renders itself to a fixed position at the bottom of the screen, displaying the given stats for the player. (See the render() method.)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int PANEL_HEIGHT
      Height of the status panel in pixels.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Panel()
      Creates a new Panel.

      Renders the status panel for the player.

    • Method Detail

      • render

        public void render(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g,
          int xo,
          int view_width,
          int shield,
          int full_shield,
          int firepower)
        Renders the status panel for the player.
        Parameters:
        g - The current Slick graphics context.
        xo - The xoffset to render the panel at
        shield - The player's current Shield level.
        full_shield - The player's current Full-Shield level.
        firepower - The player's current Firepower level.
